name: word-add-in-citation-word-counter
title: Create a Word Add-in for Citation-Aware Word Counting
shortDescription: Create a Word Add-in that accurately counts words while intelligently handling academic citations.
longDescription: Learn how to build a Word Add-in that provides accurate word counts while intelligently handling academic citations. This tool supports multiple citation styles including Harvard, APA, MLA, Chicago, and Vancouver, making it perfect for academic writing and research papers.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of the citation-aware word counter add-in interface

references.name: Office Add-ins platform overview
references.description: You can use the Office Add-ins platform to build solutions that extend Office applications and interact with content in Office documents.

references.name: Word JavaScript API reference
references.description: The Word JavaScript API provides objects and methods you can use to access and interact with Word document content.
